io.sphere.sdk.products

Class Price

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.sdk.models.Base
      • io.sphere.sdk.products.Price

  • public class Price
extends Base
    Amount that must be paid when buying goods. For construction use a PriceBuilder.
